text: Hi Josh. That's awesome! It's good to have some skills and interests other than animation. Knowing a bit about other disciplines always helps you in that you'll be a more well-rounded artist, and having an understanding of other disciplines makes you more valuable on the work floor.
As for questions, no worries! Everyone has to start somewhere, so no such thing as a dumb question. I'd also be happy to give feedback where I can :slightly_smiling_face:
